T02D3687:322b-0: @322b * // 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa bzhugs//
T02D3687:322b-2: # // bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3687:322b-3: rnal 'byor pa'i dbang phyug bsam gtan gyi khang par zhugs te /
T02D3687:322b-5: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba thams cad gdon par bya'o zhes dam bcas nas /
T02D3687:322b-6: lha mo sgrol ma bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3687:322b-7: de yang rim pa 'di ltar bya ste /
T02D3687:322b-8: rnal 'byor pa rang gi snying gar aa las zla
T02D3687:322b-9: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge t'am bsams
T02D3687:322b-10: la / de las 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba spros pas /
T02D3687:322b-11: lha mo dang rang gi bla ma dang yang dag
T02D3687:322b-12: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mdun gyi nam mkha'
T02D3687:322b-16: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02D3687:322b-17: dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba dang /
T02D3687:322b-19: smon lam gdab pa rnams byas la /
T02D3687:322b-20: de nas don dam par bdag dang lha la sogs
T02D3687:322b-21: pa rang bzhin med cing gdod ma nas ma skyes
T02D3687:322b-22: par bsam zhing / de brtan par bya ba'i phyir
T02D3687:322b-23: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba
T02D3687:322b-24: a'atma ko& ham zhes pas stong pa nyid du bsgom
T02D3687:322b-25: par bsam zhing / mo // de nas pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su /
T02D3687:322b-26: rang gi sems nyid sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
T02D3687:322b-27: gis yi ge t'am las lha mo sgrol ma bskyed
T02D3687:322b-28: par bya ste / de yang sku mdog ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D3687:322b-29: phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgyas gnas pa /
T02D3687:322b-31: don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can ;
T02D3687:322b-32: skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs pa /
T02D3687:322b-33: ji srid mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgoms la /
T02D3687:322b-34: skyon bzlas pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D3687:322b-35: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3687:322b-36: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi phreng ba rang gi snying ga nas phyung ste /
T02D3687:322b-37: yang rang gi zhal du zhugs yang rang gi kha
T02D3687:322b-38: nas 'byung ba'i rim pa sngags kyi kha dog dkar
T02D3687:322b-39: po dal bus 'khor bar bsam zhing bzlas par bya'o
T02D3687:322b-40: // bzlas pas kyang skyon mchod pa dang gtor ma btang ste smon lam btab pa /
T02D3687:322b-41: lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam thams cad la gnas par bya'o //
T02D3687:322b-42: nyal ba'i che stong pa nyid du zhugs te nyal bar bya'o //
T02D3687:323a-0: @323a * // yang langs pa'i tshe skad cig tsam gyis lha mo'i nga rgyal gyis ldang bar bya'o //
T02D3687:323a-1: 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa slob dpon mkhas pa
